Once again, a product from China listed as cotton, even on the product tag itself, but is definitely not cotton at all. (Do they not grow Cotton in China?! Do they not know that it is a naturally grown fiber and not a generic name for polyester?) I've encountered this over and over again and it is incredibly frustrating. The material of this shirt is 100% synthetic. Most likely 95% polyester and 5% spandex for stretch, but definitely NOT 95% cotton.  The style and fit are fine and it is well made. But I was looking for a true cotton long sleeve tee with a little bit of spandex for stretch. This is not that. The primary product photo is evidently a stolen image of an actual cotton shirt that this product is a copycat of.
